pageContext.claim: “But her opponent, I have to say this, Martha, a guy Named Mark Kelly. [Audience Boos] Even the Democrats don't like him much. He wants to raise your taxes, open your borders, give away free waters to illegal immigrants, and he wants to obliterate your Second Amendment.”
pageContext.analysis: "I'm not for open borders. I think we need border security. We also have to treat people fairly," Kelly said in a response to Trump's comments. Moreover, he told CNN he owns multiple firearms, but supports common sense gun legislation.
